member.name: N:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication
member.summary: 命名空间实现复制管理对象 (RMO) 模型。RMO 提供从托管代码环境对 Microsoft SQL Server 复制的编程访问。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.AddColumnOption.All
member.summary: 将新添加的列包括到在其中发布基础表的所有现有发布中。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.AddColumnOption.None
member.summary: 在其中发布基础表的任何发布中均不包括新添加的列。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.AddColumnOption.Some
member.summary: 将新添加的列只包括到指定的发布中。

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions
member.summary: 枚举已发布项目的架构选项值。

member.summary: 在订阅服务器，尝试删除不属于发布的任何对象的依赖关系。

member.summary: 包括相应的聚集索引的创建。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.Collation
member.summary: 包括列级排序规则的定义。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.CustomProcedures
member.summary: 包括自定义存储过程的生成。此选项仅对 对象有效。您必须还指定 、 和 。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.DefaultBindings
member.summary: 包括默认绑定和绑定的默认值的创建。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.DisableScripting
member.summary: 对象创建脚本不由快照代理生成。您必须指定一个用户提供的脚本文件以便为 定义订阅服务器上的对象。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.DriChecks
member.summary: 包括 CHECK 约束的创建。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.DriDefaults
member.summary: 包括列默认值的创建。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.DriForeignKeys
member.summary: 包括对发布中包含的所有被引用表的外键约束的创建。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.DriPrimaryKey
member.summary: 包括主键约束的创建。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.DriUniqueKeys
member.summary: 包括唯一键的创建。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.ExtendedProperties
member.summary: 指示与要发布的数据库对象相关联的扩展属性。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.FileGroups
member.summary: 包括与已分区表或已分区索引相关联的文件组。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.FileStreamAttribute
member.summary: 如果对 varbinary(max) 列指定了 FILESTREAM 属性，则使用此选项可复制此属性。如果要将表复制到 SQL Server 2005 订阅服务器，请勿指定此选项。不论此架构选项的设置如何，均不支持将包含 FILESTREAM 列的表复制到 SQL Server 2000 订阅服务器。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.FileStreamDataSpace
member.summary: 设置此选项可将 FILESTREAM 数据存储到订阅服务器上其自身的文件组中。如果不设置此选项，FILESTREAM 数据将存储在默认文件组中。由于复制操作不创建文件组，因此如果您设置此选项，您必须先创建文件组，然后在订阅服务器上应用快照。有关如何在应用快照前创建对象的详细信息，请参阅Executing Scripts Before and After the Snapshot Is Applied。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.FilteredIndexes
member.summary: 复制表的任何筛选的索引。有关筛选的索引的详细信息，请参阅Filtered Index Design Guidelines。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.FullTextIndex
member.summary: 包括全文索引。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.HierarchyIdToVarBinaryMax
member.summary: 将 hierarchyid 数据类型转换为 varbinary(max)，以使类型为 hierarchyid 的列能够复制到运行 SQL Server 2005 的订阅服务器。有关如何在复制的表中使用 hierarchyid 列的详细信息，请参阅 hierarchyid (Transact-SQL)。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.Identity
member.summary: 包括标识列的创建。仅对于 对象并且仅对于 Microsoft SQL Server 2005 及更高版本支持此选项。有关详细信息，请参阅Replicating Identity Columns。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.IndexPartitioningSchemes
member.summary: 包括与已分区索引相关联的分区方案。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.KeepTimestamp
member.summary: 复制时间戳列。如果没有此选项，时间戳列将在订阅服务器上作为 binary(16) 列创建。仅对于 对象支持此选项。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.LargeUserDefinedTypesToVarBinaryMax
member.summary: 将公共语言运行时 (CLR) 中大于 8000 字节的用户定义类型 (UDT) 转换为 varbinary(max)，以使类型为 UDT 的列能够复制到运行 SQL Server 2005 的订阅服务器。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.MarkReplicatedCheckConstraintsAsNotForReplication
member.summary: 在创建 CHECK 约束时包括 NOT FOR REPLICATION 子句，以便在同步期间不强制执行约束。有关详细信息，请参阅Controlling Constraints, Identities, and Triggers with NOT FOR REPLICATION。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.MarkReplicatedForeignKeyConstraintsAsNotForReplication
member.summary: 在创建 FOREIGN KEY 约束时包括 NOT FOR REPLICATION 子句，以便在同步期间不强制执行约束。有关详细信息，请参阅Controlling Constraints, Identities, and Triggers with NOT FOR REPLICATION。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.MaxTypesToMatchingNonMaxTypes
member.summary: 将 nvarchar(max)、varchar(max) 和 varbinary(max) 转换为 ntext、text 和 image 数据类型，在 SQL Server 的早期版本中支持后者。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.NewDateTimeTypesToStrings
member.summary: 将在 SQL Server 2008 中引入的日期和时间数据类型（date、time、datetimeoffset 和 datetime2）转换为 SQL Server 早期版本支持的数据类型。有关如何映射这些类型的信息，请参阅Using Multiple Versions of SQL Server in a Replication Topology中的“映射新数据类型以用于早期版本”一节。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.NonClusteredIndexes
member.summary: 包括非聚集索引的创建。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.NoXmlSchemaCollections
member.summary: 不包括绑定到 xml 列的 XML 架构集合。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.Permissions
member.summary: 包括对已发布对象定义的权限。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.PrimaryKeyUniqueKeyAsConstraints
member.summary: 在复制约束时生成 ALTER TABLE 语句。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.PrimaryObject
member.summary: 为已发布对象生成创建脚本（CREATE TABLE、CREATE PROCEDURE 等）。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.RuleBindings
member.summary: 包括规则绑定和绑定的规则的创建。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.Schema
member.summary: 生成订阅服务器上没有的任何架构。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.SparseAttribute
member.summary: 复制列的 SPARSE 属性。有关该属性的详细信息，请参阅Using Sparse Columns。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.SpatialIndexes
member.summary: 复制类型为 geography 和 geometry 的列的索引。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.SpatialTypesToVarBinaryMax
member.summary: 将 geography 和 geometry 数据类型转换为 varbinary(max)，以使这些类型的列能够复制到运行 SQL Server 2005 的订阅服务器。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.Statistics
member.summary: 包括用户定义的表统计信息。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.StorageCompressionSetting
member.summary: 复制数据和索引的压缩选项。有关详细信息，请参阅Creating Compressed Tables and Indexes。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.CreationScriptOptions.UserDefinedTypesToBaseTypes
member.summary: 将位于发布服务器上的用户定义数据类型转换为订阅服务器上的基础 SQL Server 数据类型列。对于非 SQL Server 发布服务器，不支持此选项。

member.summary: 包括用户定义触发器的创建。

member.summary: 包括 XML 索引。

member.summary: 不使用预计算分区。

member.summary: 使用预计算分区。

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PartitionOptions
member.summary: 枚举在合并发布使用参数化的行筛选器时在订阅中对项目中的数据进行分区的方式。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PartitionOptions.NonOverlappingSharedBetweenSubscriptions
member.summary: 对项目的筛选将生成不重叠分区，但多个订阅服务器可以接收到相同的分区。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PartitionOptions.NonOverlappingSingleSubscription
member.summary: 对项目的筛选将为每个订阅生成唯一的不重叠分区。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PartitionOptions.Overlapping
member.summary: 项目的筛选是静态的，或者不会为每个分区生成一个唯一数据子集（即“重叠”分区）。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PartitionOptions.OverlappingDisallowOutOfPartitionDml
member.summary: 分区是重叠的，订阅服务器中执行的数据操作语言 (DML) 更新不能更改行所属的分区。

member.summary: 获取或设置在同步过程中发生冲突时是否允许订阅调用交互式冲突解决程序。

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationArticle.ArticleName
member.summary: 获取或设置项目的名称。

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationArticle.ArticleResolver
member.summary: 获取或设置同步项目时使用的自定义冲突解决程序或业务逻辑处理程序的友好名称。

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationArticle.ArticleType

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationArticle.PublicationName

member.summary: 获取或设置项目所属于的发布的类型。

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationArticle.ResolverInfo
member.summary: 获取或设置要由基于组件对象模型 (COM) 的冲突解决程序使用的附加数据和参数。

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationArticle.UserData
member.summary: 获取或设置允许用户附加他们自己的数据的对象。

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationArticle.VerifyResolverSignature
member.summary: 获取或设置用于在基于组件对象模型 (COM) 的冲突解决程序上验证数字签名，以确定它是否来自可信任的来源的选项。

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes
member.summary: 枚举支持的发布属性。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.AllowAnonymous
member.summary: 匿名订阅可以订阅发布。如果您要创建某一订阅但不在发布服务器上注册此订阅，则匿名订阅是必需的。如果在订阅配置期间无法建立与发布服务器的 SQL Server 连接，则匿名订阅是必需的。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.AllowDtsTransformation
member.summary: 后续版本的 Microsoft SQL Server 将删除该功能。请不要在新的开发工作中使用该功能，并尽快修改当前还在使用该功能的应用程序。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.AllowInitializationFromBackup
member.summary: 订阅服务器可以从备份而非初始快照中初始化对发布的订阅。只有事务复制或快照复制支持该值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.AllowPartitionRealignment
member.summary: 在对发布服务器上的行的修改导致发布服务器更改其分区时以及发布使用参数化筛选器时，删除将发送到订阅服务器。只有合并发布支持该值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.AllowPull
member.summary: 支持在订阅服务器运行同步代理的订阅（请求订阅）。需要它来支持 SQL Server Compact 3.5 SP1 订阅服务器。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.AllowPush
member.summary: 支持在分发服务器运行同步代理的订阅（推送订阅）。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.AllowQueuedTransactions
member.summary: 对于事务发布，支持排队更新订阅。只有事务发布支持该值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.AllowSubscriberInitiatedSnapshot
member.summary: 订阅服务器可以启动快照进程，以便在合并发布具有参数化筛选器时为其数据分区生成筛选快照。只有合并发布支持该值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.AllowSubscriptionCopy
member.summary: 可以复制和附加订阅发布的数据库，以便创建新的订阅。可附加订阅已不推荐使用。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.AllowSynchronousTransactions
member.summary: 对于事务发布，支持立即更新订阅。只有事务发布支持该值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.AllowSyncToAlternate
member.summary: 订阅服务器可与服务器（而非订阅源于的发布服务器）同步对合并发布的订阅。只有合并发布支持该值。不推荐使用此功能，该功能将在未来版本中删除。SQL Server Compact 3.5 SP1 订阅服务器不支持此值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.AllowWebSynchronization
member.summary: 订阅服务器可使用 HTTPS 协议通过 Internet 同步订阅。只有合并发布支持该值。仅可用于 SQL Server 2005。需要它来支持 SQL Server Compact 3.5 SP1 订阅服务器。有关详细信息，请参阅Web Synchronization for Merge Replication。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.AutomaticGenerateSyncProcedures
member.summary: 将自动生成更新订阅用于与事务发布同步的存储过程。只有事务发布支持该值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.CentralizedConflicts
member.summary: 在发布服务器上存储冲突记录。只有合并发布支持该值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.CompressSnapshot
member.summary: 快照文件将压缩为 CAB 格式。不能压缩大于 2 GB 的快照文件。SQL Server Compact 3.5 SP1 订阅服务器不支持此值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.DecentralizedConflicts
member.summary: 在订阅服务器上存储冲突记录。只有合并发布支持该值。SQL Server Compact 3.5 SP1 订阅服务器不支持此值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.DynamicFilters
member.summary: 在合并发布上支持参数化行筛选器。只有合并发布支持该值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.EnabledForHeterogeneousSubscribers
member.summary: 支持非 SQL Server 订阅服务器。只有事务发布或快照发布支持该值。仅可用于 SQL Server 2005 和更高版本。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.EnabledForPeerToPeer
member.summary: 支持对等事务复制。只有事务发布支持该值。仅可用于 SQL Server 2005 和更高版本。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.ImmediateSync
member.summary: 每次运行快照代理时重新创建发布的同步文件。如果快照代理在订阅创建前完成，则订阅服务器可以立即获得同步文件。新订阅将获取最近一次执行快照代理所生成的最新同步文件。在设置 时，也必须设置 。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.IndependentAgent
member.summary: 在与发布服务器同步时，每个订阅都使用自己的复制代理实例。设置此选项可减少滞后时间并且是事务发布的默认设置。合并复制始终使用独立的代理。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.InternetEnabled
member.summary: 可通过 Internet 同步发布，并且可以使用文件传输协议 (FTP) 向订阅服务器传输快照文件。有关详细信息，请参阅Implementing Replication over the Internet。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.KeepPartitionChanges
member.summary: 在无法使用预计算分区时，使用分区更改优化。在 为 时，不要指定 。有关详细信息，请参阅Optimizing Parameterized Filter Performance with Precomputed Partitions。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.None
member.summary: 从 中删除所有选项。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationAttributes.SnapshotInDefaultFolder
member.summary: 在默认文件夹中维护用于发布的快照文件。在未指定 时，必须使用 为快照文件指定备用位置。

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationCompatibilityLevel
member.summary: 枚举合并复制使用的产品版本值来确定给定数据库中的发布可以使用哪些功能。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationCompatibilityLevel.LatestVersion
member.summary: 发布仅与 SQL Server 的最新版本兼容。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationCompatibilityLevel.Version100
member.summary: 发布向后兼容到 SQL Server 2008。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationCompatibilityLevel.Version70
member.summary: 发布向后兼容到 SQL Server 7.0。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationCompatibilityLevel.Version70SP1
member.summary: 发布向后兼容到 SQL Server 7.0 Service Pack 1。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationCompatibilityLevel.Version70SP2
member.summary: 发布向后兼容到 SQL Server 7.0 Service Pack 2。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationCompatibilityLevel.Version70SP3
member.summary: 发布向后兼容到 SQL Server 7.0 Service Pack 3。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationCompatibilityLevel.Version80
member.summary: 发布向后兼容到 SQL Server 2000。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationCompatibilityLevel.Version80SP1
member.summary: 发布向后兼容到 SQL Server 2000 Service Pack 1。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationCompatibilityLevel.Version80SP3
member.summary: 发布向后兼容到 SQL Server 2000 Service Pack 3。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationCompatibilityLevel.Version90
member.summary: 发布向后兼容到 SQL Server 2005。

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationMonitor.ChangeMonitorThreshold(System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: 更改发布的监视阈值标准。
member.param: Is the ID of the publication threshold metric being changed and can be one of these values:ValueMetric Name1 Expiration. Monitors for imminent expiration of subscriptions to transactional publications.2 Latency. Monitors for the performance of subscriptions to transactional publications.4 Mergeexpiration. Monitors for imminent expiration of subscriptions to merge publications.5 Mergeslowrunduration. Monitors the duration of merge synchronizations over low-bandwidth (dial-up) connections.6 Mergefastrunduration. Monitors the duration of merge synchronizations over high-bandwidth local area network (LAN) connections.7 Mergefastrunspeed. Monitors the synchronization rate of merge synchronizations over high-bandwidth (LAN) connections.8 Mergeslowrunspeed. Monitors the synchronization rate of merge synchronizations over low-bandwidth (dial-up) connections.
Specifies whether the metric is enabled or disabled on the publication.
New value for the publication threshold metric.
Specifies whether or not an alert is generated when the publication threshold metric is reached.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationMonitor.CleanUpTracerTokenHistory(System.Int32)

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationMonitor.EnumLogReaderAgent
member.summary: 为监视的发布使用的日志读取器代理作业返回信息。

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationMonitor.EnumSubscriptions2(Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.SubscriptionResultOption)
member.summary: 返回订阅监视的发布的订阅的有关附加信息。
member.returns: A object that contains the following columns.ColumnData typeDescriptionstatus Maximum status of all replication agents associated with the publication, which can be one of these values: 1 = Started2 = Succeeded3 = In progress4 = Idle5 = Retrying6 = Failedwarning Maximum threshold warning generated by a subscription belonging to the publication, which can be the logical OR result of one or more of these values.1 = Expiration. A subscription to a transactional publication has exceeded the retention period by more than the allowable threshold, as a percentage of the retention period. 2 = Latency. The time taken to replicate data from a transactional Publisher to the Subscriber exceeds the threshold, in seconds.4 = Mergeexpiration. A subscription to a merge publication has exceeded the retention period by more than the allowable threshold, as a percentage of the retention period. 8 = Mergefastrunduration. The time taken to complete synchronization of a merge subscription exceeds the threshold over a fast network connection, in seconds.16 = Mergeslowrunduration. The time taken to complete synchronization of a merge subscription exceeds the threshold over a slow or dial-up network connection, in seconds.32 = Mergefastrunspeed. The delivery rate for rows during synchronization of a merge subscription has failed to maintain the threshold rate over a fast network connection, in rows per second.64 = Mergeslowrunspeed. The delivery rate for rows during synchronization of a merge subscription has failed to maintain the threshold rate over a slow or dial-up network connection, in rows per second.subscriber Is the name of the Subscriber.subscriber_db Is the name of the database used for the subscription.publisher_db Is the name of the Publisher.publication Is the name of a publication.publication_type Is the type of publication, which can be one of these values:0 = Transactional publication1 = Snapshot publication2 = Merge publicationsubtype Is the subscription type, which can be one of the following values:0 = Push1 = Pull2 = Anonymouslatency The highest latency, in seconds, for data changes propagated by the Log Reader Agent or Distribution Agents for a transactional publication. latencythreshold Is the maximum latency for the transactional publication above which a warning is raised. agentnotrunning Is the length of time, in hours, during which the agent has not run.agentnotrunningthreshold Is the length of time, in hours, that the agent has not run before a warning is raised.timetoexpiration Is the length of time, in hours, before the subscription expires if not synchronized.expirationthreshold Is the time, in hours, before the subscription expires that a warning is raised.last_distsync Is the date/time that the Distribution Agent last ran.distribution_agentname Is the name of the Distribution Agent job for the subscription to a transactional publication.mergeagentname Is the name of the Merge Agent job for the subscription to a merge publication.mergesubscriptionfriendlyname Is the friendly name of the Merge Agent job for the subscription to a merge publication.mergeagentlocation Is the name of the server on which the Merge Agent runs.mergeconnectiontype Connection used when synchronizing a subscription to a merge publication, which can be one of the following values: 1 = Local area network (LAN)2 = Dial-up network connectionmergePerformance Performance of the last synchronization compared to all synchronizations for the subscription, which is based on the delivery rate of the last synchronization divided by the average of all previous delivery rates. mergerunspeed Is the delivery rate of the last synchronization for the subscription.mergerunduration Is the length of time to complete the last synchronization of the subscription.monitorranking Is the ranking value used to order the subscriptions in the result set.For a transactional publication, it can be one of these values:60 = Error56 = Warning: performance critical52 = Warning: expiring soon or expired50 = Warning: subscription uninitialized40 = Retrying failed command 30 = Not running (success)20 = Running (starting, running, or idle)For a merge publication, it can be one of these values:60 = Error 56 = Warning: performance critical54 = Warning: long-running merge52 = Warning: expiring soon or expired50 = Warning: subscription uninitialized 40 = Retrying failed command 30 = Running (starting, running, or idle)20 = Not running (success)distributionagentjobid [16]ID of the Distribution Agent job for subscriptions to a transactional publication.mergeagentjobid [16]ID of the Merge Agent job for subscriptions to a transactional publication.distributionagentid ID of the Distribution Agent job for the subscription.distributionagentprofileid ID of the agent profile used by the Distribution Agent.mergeagentid ID of the Merge Agent job for the subscription.mergeagentprofileid ID of the agent profile used by the Merge Agent.

publication.average_runspeedPerfintIs the average synchronization time for the merge publication.retention_period_unitintIs the unit used to express retention.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublisherMonitor.EnumDistributionAgentSessionDetails(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 返回有关分发代理会话的详细信息。
member.returns: A object that contains the following columns. member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublisherMonitor.EnumDistributionAgentSessions(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 返回有关分发代理会话的信息。
member.returns: A object that contains the following columns. ColumnData typeDescriptionrunstatus The running status:1 = Start 2 = Succeed 3 = In progress 4 = Idle 5 = Retry 6 = Failstart_time Date and time of last agent execution.time Date and time that the session was logged.comments Message text logged by the agent.duration Elapsed time of the session, in seconds.delivery_rate Average number of commands delivered per second.delivery_latency Latency, in milliseconds, between the transaction entering the distribution database and being applied to the Subscriber.(No column name)Not applicableInternal use only.delivered_transactionsTotal number of transactions delivered in the session.delivered_commands Total number of commands delivered in the session.average_commands Average number of commands per transaction delivered in the session.action_count Number of agent log messages recorded in the session.error_id The ID of the error in the MSrepl_errors system table. Use the method to return detailed information about an error.
member.param: A value that specifies the name of the Distribution Agent job. You can use the property of the object to obtain this value.

An value that specifies the number of hours before the current time to which to limit the results. For example, a value of 24 will return information about Distribution Agent sessions over the last 24 hours. A value of -1 returns information on the last 100 sessions, and a value of 0 returns information on all sessions.
A value that specifies whether to return information only on sessions that resulted in an error or on all sessions. If true, only error sessions are returned. If false, all sessions are returned.

The time taken to complete synchronization of a merge subscription exceeds the threshold over a slow or dial-up network connection, in seconds.32 = Mergefastrunspeed. The delivery rate for rows during synchronization of a merge subscription has failed to maintain the threshold rate over a fast network connection, in rows per second.64 = Mergeslowrunspeed. The delivery rate for rows during synchronization of a merge subscription has failed to maintain the threshold rate over a slow or dial-up network connection, in rows per second.worst_latency The highest latency, in seconds, for data changes propagated by the Log Reader or Distribution Agents for a transactional publication. best_latency The lowest latency, in seconds, for data changes propagated by the Log Reader or Distribution Agents for a transactional publication. average_latency The average latency, in seconds, for data changes propagated by the Log Reader or Distribution Agents for a transactional publication. last_distsync Is the last date/time that the Distribution Agent ran.retention Is the retention period for the publication.latencythreshold Is the latency threshold set for the transactional publication.expirationthreshold Is the expiration threshold set for the publication if it is a merge publication.agentnotrunningthreshold Is the threshold set for the longest time for an agent not to have run.subscriptioncount Is the number of subscriptions to a publication.runningdistagentcount Is the number of Distribution Agents running for the publicationsnapshot_agentname Name of the Snapshot Agent job for the publication.logreader_agentname Name of the Log Reader Agent job for the transactional publication.qreader_agentname Name of the Queue Reader Agent job for an immediate updating transactional publication.worst_runspeedPerf Is the longest synchronization time for the merge publication.best_runspeedPerf Is the shortest synchronization time for the merge publication.average_runspeedPerf Is the average synchronization time for the merge publication.retention_period_unit Is the unit used to express retention.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublisherMonitor.EnumSnapshotAgentSessionDetails(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 返回有关快照代理会话的详细信息。
member.returns: A object that contains the following columns. ColumnData typeDescriptionrunstatus The running status:1 = Start 2 = Succeed 3 = In progress 4 = Idle 5 = Retry 6 = Failtime Time of logging for session detail.comments Descriptive text.duration Elapsed time of the logged session activity, in seconds.delivery_rate Average number of commands delivered per second.delivered_commandsTotal number of commands delivered in the session.name Name of the Snapshot Agent job.error_id The ID of the error in the MSrepl_errors system table. Use the method to return detailed information about an error.
member.param: A value that specifies the name of the Log Reader Agent. You can obtain this value from the property of the published database.
A value that represents the data and time of the session for which details are returned. This value can be obtained from the time column returned by the method.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublisherMonitor.EnumSnapshotAgentSessions(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 返回有关快照代理会话的信息。
member.returns: A object that contains the following columns. ColumnData typeDescriptionrunstatus The running status:1 = Start 2 = Succeed 3 = In progress 4 = Idle 5 = Retry 6 = Failstart_time Date and time of the last agent execution.time Date and time that the session was logged.comments Message text logged by the agent.duration Elapsed time of the session, in seconds.delivery_rate Average number of commands delivered per second.delivered_commands Total number of commands delivered in the session.action_count Number of agent log messages recorded in the session.error_id The ID of the error in the MSrepl_errors system table. Use the method to return detailed information about an error.
member.param: A value that specifies the name of the Log Reader Agent. You can obtain this value from the property of the published database.

An value that specifies the number of hours before the current time to which to limit the results. For example, a value of 24 will return information about agent sessions over the last 24 hours. A value of -1 returns information on the last 100 sessions, and a value of 0 returns information on all sessions.
A value that specifies whether to return information only on sessions that resulted in an error or on all sessions. If true, only error sessions are returned. If false, all sessions are returned.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublisherMonitor.EnumSubscriptions(Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.PublicationType,Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.SubscriptionResultOption)
member.summary: 返回有关订阅的信息，这些订阅属于监视的发布服务器上的发布。
member.returns: A object that contains the following columns. ColumnData typeDescriptionstatus Maximum status of all replication agents associated with the publication, which can be one of the following values: 1 = Started2 = Succeeded3 = In progress4 = Idle5 = Retrying6 = Failedwarning Maximum threshold warning generated by a subscription belonging to the publication, which can be the logical OR result of one or more of the following values.1 = Expiration. A subscription to a transactional publication has exceeded the retention period by more than the allowable threshold, as a percentage of the retention period. 2 = Latency. The time taken to replicate data from a transactional Publisher to the Subscriber exceeds the threshold, in seconds.4 = Mergeexpiration. A subscription to a merge publication has exceeded the retention period by more than the allowable threshold, as a percentage of the retention period. 8 = Mergefastrunduration. The time taken to complete synchronization of a merge subscription exceeds the threshold over a fast network connection, in seconds.16 = Mergeslowrunduration The time taken to complete synchronization of a merge subscription exceeds the threshold over a slow or dial-up network connection, in seconds.32 = Mergefastrunspeed. The delivery rate for rows during synchronization of a merge subscription has failed to maintain the threshold rate over a fast network connection, in rows per second.64 = Mergeslowrunspeed. The delivery rate for rows during synchronization of a merge subscription has failed to maintain the threshold rate over a slow or dial-up network connection, in rows per second.subscriber Is the name of the Subscriber.subscriber_db Is the name of the database used for the subscription.publisher_db Is the name of the Publisher.publication Is the name of a publication.publication_type Is the type of publication, which can be one of the following values:0 = Transactional publication1 = Snapshot publication2 = Merge publicationsubtype Is the subscription type, which can be one of the following values:0 = Push1 = Pull2 = Anonymouslatency The highest latency, in seconds, for data changes propagated by the Log Reader or Distribution Agents for a transactional publication. latencythreshold Is the maximum latency for the transactional publication above which a warning is raised. agentnotrunning Is the length of time, in hours, during which the agent has not run.agentnotrunningthreshold Is the length of time, in hours, that the agent has not run before a warning is raised.timetoexpiration Is the length of time, in hours, before the subscription expires if not synchronized.expirationthreshold Is the time, in hours, before the subscription expires that a warning is raised.last_distsync Is the date/time that the Distribution Agent last ran.distribution_agentname Is the name of the Distribution Agent job for the subscription to a transactional publication.mergeagentname Is the name of the Merge Agent job for the subscription to a merge publication.mergesubscriptionfriendlyname Is the friendly name of the Merge Agent job for the subscription to a merge publication.mergeagentlocation Is the name of the server on which the Merge Agent runs.mergeconnectiontype Connection used when synchronizing a subscription to a merge publication, which can be one of the following values: 1 = Local area network (LAN)2 = Dial-up network connectionmergePerformance Performance of the last synchronization compared to all synchronizations for the subscription, which is based on the delivery rate of the last synchronization divided by the average of all previous delivery rates. mergerunspeed Is the delivery rate of the last synchronization for the subscription.mergerunduration Is the length of time to complete the last synchronization of the subscription.monitorranking Is the ranking value used to order the subscriptions in the result set, and can be one of the following values:For a transactional publication:60 = Error56 = Warning: performance critical52 = Warning: expiring soon or expired50 = Warning: subscription uninitialized40 = Retrying failed command 30 = Not running (success)20 = Running (starting, running, or idle)For a merge publication:60 = Error 56 = Warning: performance critical54 = Warning: long-running merge52 = Warning: expiring soon or expired50 = Warning: subscription uninitialized 40 = Retrying failed command 30 = Running (starting, running, or idle)20 = Not running (success)distributionagentjobid [16]ID of the Distribution Agent job for subscriptions to a transactional publication.mergeagentjobid [16]ID of the Merge Agent job for subscriptions to a transactional publication.distributionagentid ID of the Distribution Agent job for the subscription.distributionagentprofileid ID of the agent profile used by the Distribution Agent.mergeagentid ID of the Merge Agent job for the subscription.mergeagentprofileid ID of the agent profile used by the Merge Agent.
member.param: A value that specifies the type of publication to which the subscription is subscribed.
A value that specifies the result options.

member.summary: 获取或设置是否为事务发布或快照发布启用数据库。

member.summary: 创建 类的新实例。

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationMonitor.#ctor(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Common.ServerConnection)
member.summary: 使用与 Microsoft SQL Server 实例的指定连接创建 类的新实例。
member.param: A object value that specifies the connection context used to establish a connection with the instance of SQL Server.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationMonitor.EnumDistributionAgents
member.summary: 返回监视的分发服务器上的分发代理作业的有关信息。
member.returns: A object that contains the following columns. ColumnData typeDescriptiondb_nameName of the distribution database.nameName of the replication agent job.status The running status:1 = Start 2 = Succeed 3 = In progress 4 = Idle 5 = Retry 6 = FailpublisherPublisher name.publisher_db Name of the publication database.publicationPublication name.subscriberSubscriber name.subscriber_db Name of the subscription database.subscription_typeThe type of subscription:0 = Push 1 = Pull 2 = Anonymousstart_time Date and time of the last agent execution.time Date and time that the session was logged.duration Elapsed time of the session, in seconds.comments Message text logged by the agent.delivery_timeThe time the first transaction is delivered.delivered_transactionsTotal number of transactions delivered in the session.delivered_commands Total number of commands delivered in the session.average_commands Average number of commands per transaction delivered in the session.delivery_rate Average number of commands delivered per second.delivery_latency Latency, in milliseconds, between the transaction entering the distribution database and being applied to the Subscriber.error_id The ID of the error in the MSrepl_errors system table. Use the method to return detailed information about an error.job_id[16]Identifier of the SQL Server Agent job starting the replication agent.local_jobWhen true, the agent job is available at the Distributor. profile_id Profile identifier.agent_id Agent job identifier.local_timestamp [8]Timestamp of the most recent agent run.offload_enabledIf true, the subscription supports remote agent activation. Remote agent activation has been discontinued. For more information, see Discontinued Functionality in SQL Server 2005 Replication.offload_serverName of the server used with remote agent activation.Remote agent activation has been discontinued. For more information, see Discontinued Functionality in SQL Server 2005 Replication.subscriber_type The data source type at the Subscriber:0 = SQL Server Subscriber.1 = Open Database Connectivity (ODBC) data source.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationMonitor.EnumErrorRecords(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: 返回与同步会话过程中出现的指定错误 ID 相关联的错误有关的信息。
member.returns: A object that contains the following columns. ColumnData typeDescriptionsource_type_id Identifies the source of the error.source_name The name of the error source.error_code The error code.error_text The message text for the error.(No column name)Date and time that the error occurred.error_type_idType of error that occurred.has_xact_seqnoIf the error has a corresponding transaction log sequence number. xact_seqno[]The starting transaction log sequence number of the failed execution batch. command_idThe command ID of the first command in the failed execution batch.
member.param: A value that specifies the distribution database.
An value that specifies the ID value that uniquely identifies the error.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationMonitor.EnumLogReaderAgents
member.summary: 返回监视的分发服务器上的日志读取器代理作业的有关信息。
member.returns: A object that contains the following columns. ColumnData typeDescriptiondb_nameName of the distribution database.nameReplication agent job name.status The running status:1 = Start 2 = Succeed 3 = In progress 4 = Idle 5 = Retry 6 = FailpublisherPublisher name.publisher_db Name of the publication database.start_time Date and time of the last agent execution.time Date and time that the session was logged.duration Elapsed time of the session, in seconds.comments Message text logged by the agent.delivery_timeThe time the first transaction is delivered.delivered_transactionsTotal number of transactions delivered in the session.delivered_commands Total number of commands delivered in the session.average_commands Average number of commands per transaction delivered in the session.delivery_rate Average number of commands delivered per second.delivery_latency The time, in milliseconds, between a command being committed to the published database and being committed to the distribution database. error_id The ID of the error in the MSrepl_errors system table. Use the method to return detailed information about an error.job_id[16]Identifier of the SQL Server Agent job starting the replication agent.local_jobWhen true, the agent job is available at the Distributor. profile_id Profile identifier.agent_id Agent job identifier.local_timestamp [8]Timestamp of the most recent agent run.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationMonitor.EnumMiscellaneousAgents
member.summary: 返回监视的分发服务器上的其他复制代理作业的有关信息。
member.returns: A object that contains the following columns. ColumnData typeDescriptionnameReplication agent job name.agent_typeType of miscellaneous replication agent.status The running status:1 = Start 2 = Succeed 3 = In progress 4 = Idle 5 = Retry 6 = Failmessage Message text logged by the agent.start_time Date and time of the last agent execution.run_duration Elapsed time of the session, in seconds.job_id[16]Identifier of the SQL Server Agent job starting the replication agent.local_timestamp [8]Timestamp of the most recent agent run.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationMonitor.EnumPublishers
member.summary: 返回使用监视的分发服务器的发布服务器的有关信息。
member.returns: A object that contains the following columns. ColumnData typeDescriptionname Name of Publisher.distribution_db Distribution database for the specified Publisher.security_mode Security mode used by the replication agent in a push subscription to connect to the Publisher.login Login name used by the replication agent in a push subscription to connect to the Publisher.password Password returned (in simple encrypted form). Password is null for users other than sysadmin.active Whether a remote Publisher is using the local server as a Distributor:working_directory Name of the working directory.trusted If the password is required when the Publisher connects to the Distributor. For Microsoft SQL Server 2005, this should always return 0, which means that the password is required.thirdparty_flag Whether the publication is enabled by SQL Server or by a third-party application:false = Oracle, or Oracle Gateway Publisher. true = Publisher has been integrated with SQL Server using a third-party application.publisher_type Type of Publisher, which can be one of the following:MSSQLSERVER ORACLE ORACLE GATEWAY publisher_data_source Name of the OLE DB data source on the Publisher.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationMonitor.EnumPublishers2
member.summary: 返回使用当前连接的服务器作为分发服务器的发布服务器的列表。
member.returns: A object that contains the following columns. ColumnData typeDescriptionpublisher Is the name of a Publisher.distribution_db Is the name of the distribution database used by a given Publisher.status Maximum status of all replication agents associated with publications at this Publisher, which can be one of these values.1 = Started2 = Succeeded3 = In progress4 = Idle5 = Retrying6 = Failedwarning Maximum threshold warning generated by a subscription belonging to a publication at this Publisher, which can be the logical OR result of one or more of these values.1 = Expiration. A subscription to a transactional publication has exceeded the retention period by more than the allowable threshold, as a percentage of the retention period. 2 = Latency. The time taken to replicate data from a transactional Publisher to the Subscriber exceeds the threshold, in seconds.4 = Mergeexpiration. A subscription to a merge publication has exceeded the retention period by more than the allowable threshold, as a percentage of the retention period. 8 = Mergefastrunduration. The time taken to complete synchronization of a merge subscription exceeds the threshold over a fast network connection, in seconds.16 = Mergeslowrunduration. The time taken to complete synchronization of a merge subscription exceeds the threshold over a slow or dial-up network connection, in seconds.32 = Mergefastrunspeed. The delivery rate for rows during synchronization of a merge subscription has failed to maintain the threshold rate over a fast network connection, in rows per second.64 = Mergeslowrunspeed. The delivery rate for rows during synchronization of a merge subscription has failed to maintain the threshold rate over a slow or dial-up network connection, in rows per second.publicationcount Is the number of publications belonging to the Publisher.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationMonitor.EnumQueueReaderAgents
member.summary: 返回监视的分发服务器上的队列读取器代理作业的有关信息。
member.returns: A object that contains the following columns. ColumnData typeDescriptiondb_nameName of the distribution database.nameReplication agent job name.status The running status:1 = Start 2 = Succeed 3 = In progress 4 = Idle 5 = Retry 6 = Failstart_time Date and time of the last agent execution.time Date and time that the session was logged.duration Elapsed time of the session, in seconds.comments Message text logged by the agent.transactions_processed Total number of transactions delivered in the session.commands_processedTotal number of commands delivered in the session.average_commands Average number of commands per transaction delivered in the session.delivery_rate Average number of commands delivered per second.delivery_latency The time, in milliseconds, between a command being added to the queue and being committed to the publication database. error_id The ID of the error in the MSrepl_errors system table. Use the method to return detailed information about an error.job_id[16]Identifier of the SQL Server Agent job starting the replication agent.profile_id Profile identifier.agent_id Agent job identifier.local_timestamp [8]Timestamp of the most recent agent run.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationMonitor.EnumQueueReaderAgentSessionDetails(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: 返回有关队列读取器代理会话的详细信息。
member.returns: A object that contains the following columns. ColumnData typeDescriptionrunstatus The running status:1 = Start 2 = Succeed 3 = In progress 4 = Idle 5 = Retry 6 = Failtime Time of logging for session detail.comments Descriptive text.transaction_id The transaction ID stored with the message, if applicable.transaction_status The status of the transaction.commands_processed The total number of commands processed in the session.subscriberThe name of the Subscriber.subscriberdbThe name of the subscription database.error_id The ID of the error in the MSrepl_errors system table. Use the method to return detailed information about an error.
member.param: A value that specifies the distribution database.
An value specifying the ID value that uniquely identifies the publication.
A value specifying the ID value that uniquely identifies the session. The sessionID contains the date and time, converted from a system object value, when the session actually occurred.

member.summary: 返回与队列读取器代理会话有关的信息（包括状态和统计信息）的列表。
member.returns: A object that contains the following columns. ColumnData typeDescriptionrunstatus The running status:1 = Start 2 = Succeed 3 = In progress 4 = Idle 5 = Retry 6 = Failstart_time Date and time of the last agent execution.time Date and time that the session was logged.comments Message text logged by the agent.duration Elapsed time of the session, in seconds.delivery_rate Average number of commands delivered per second.delivery_latency The time, in milliseconds, between a command being committed to the published database and being committed to the distribution database. publication_idID of the publication.transactions_processedTotal number of transactions delivered in the session.commands_processed Total number of commands delivered in the session.average_commands Average number of commands per transaction delivered in the session.action_count Number of agent log messages recorded in the session.error_id The ID of the error in the MSrepl_errors system table. Use the method to return detailed information about an error.
member.param: A value that specifies the distribution database.
An value that specifies the ID value that uniquely identifies the publication.

An value that specifies the number of hours before the current time to which to limit the results. For example, a value of 24 will return information about agent sessions over the last 24 hours. A value of -1 returns information on the last 100 sessions, and a value of 0 returns information on all sessions.
A value that specifies whether to return information only on sessions that resulted in an error or on all sessions. If true, only error sessions are returned. If false, all sessions are returned.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationMonitor.EnumSnapshotAgents
member.summary: 返回监视的分发服务器上的快照代理作业的有关信息。
member.returns: A object that contains the following columns. ColumnData typeDescriptiondb_nameName of the distribution database.nameReplication agent job name.status The running status:1 = Start 2 = Succeed 3 = In progress 4 = Idle 5 = Retry 6 = FailpublisherPublisher name.publisher_db Name of the publication database.publication Name of the publication.start_time Date and time of the last agent execution.time Date and time that the session was logged.duration Elapsed time of the session, in seconds.comments Message text logged by the agent.delivered_transactionsTotal number of transactions delivered in the session.delivered_commands Total number of commands delivered in the session.delivery_rate Average number of commands delivered per second.error_id The ID of the error in the MSrepl_errors system table. Use the method to return detailed information about an error.job_id[16]Identifier of the SQL Server Agent job starting the replication agent.local_jobWhen true, the agent job is available at the Distributor. profile_id Profile identifier.agent_id Agent job identifier.local_timestamp [8]Timestamp of the most recent agent run.dynamic_filter_loginThe value used for evaluating the SUSER_SNAME function in parameterized filters that defines a partition.dynamic_filter_hostnameThe value used for evaluating the HOST_NAME function in parameterized filters that defines a partition.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationTable
member.summary: 表示复制所要求的表对象的有关信息。

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationTable.#ctor
member.summary: 创建 类的新实例。

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationTable.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Common.ServerConnection)
member.summary: 使用指定的名称和所有者、在指定的数据库上并且使用与 Microsoft SQL Server 实例的指定连接创建 类的新实例。
member.param: A value that specifies the name of the database.
A value that specifies the owner of the database. If no value is specified, then the db_owner user is assumed.
A value that specifies the database to which the replication table belongs.
A object that specifies the connection context that is used to establish a connection with the instance of SQL Server.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationTable.EnumIdentityRangeInfo
member.summary: 返回与基于表的项目有关的标识范围信息。

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationTable.EnumReplicationColumns
member.summary: 从可复制的表中返回列。

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationTable.ReplicationAddColumn(System.String,System.String,Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.AddColumnOption,System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: 将列添加到已在一个或多个发布中发布的表。
member.param: A value that specifies the name of the column to be added.
A value that contains the syntax that follows the column_name parameter in the ALTER TABLE statement in Transact-SQL.
An object value that specifies whether to include the column in some, all, or no publications. If is specified, the publicationNames parameter cannot be empty.
A array that contains the names of publications to which the column is to be included. This parameter is used only when addType is Some.

An optional value that specifies a schema change script to propagate to the Subscriber. This is only valid for transactional and snapshot publications. Use null or empty string if you do not want to specify this parameter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationTable.ReplicationDropColumn(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 从已在一个或多个发布中发布的表中删除列。
member.param: A value that specifies the name of the column to be removed.

An optional value that specifies a schema change script to propagate to the Subscriber. This is only valid for transactional and snapshot publications. Use null or empty string if you do not want to specify this parameter.

member.summary: 获取表是否具有主键。

member.summary: 获取表是否具有 sql_variant 类型列。

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationWarnings
member.summary: 枚举支持的复制阈值监视器警告值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationWarnings.Expiration
member.summary: 对事务发布或快照发布的订阅到期。自上次同步以来的时间超出到期阈值（以小时为单位的保持期的百分比）。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationWarnings.FastLinkMergeRunDuration
member.summary: 合并代理在慢速连接（例如拨号网络）中完成一次合并运行所用的时间超出慢速链接合并运行阈值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationWarnings.FastLinkMergeRunSpeed
member.summary: 快速连接（例如局域网）中的合并传送速率超出快速链接合并运行速度阈值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationWarnings.Latency
member.summary: 将数据从事务发布服务器（提交）复制到订阅服务器（提交）所用的时间超出滞后时间阈值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationWarnings.MergeExpiration
member.summary: 对事务发布或快照发布的订阅到期。自上次同步以来的时间超出到期阈值（以小时为单位的保持期的百分比）。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationWarnings.None
member.summary: 没有任何项超出阈值，或者未定义阈值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationWarnings.SlowLinkMergeRunDuration
member.summary: 合并代理在慢速连接（例如拨号网络）中完成一次合并运行所用的时间超出慢速链接合并运行阈值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ReplicationWarnings.SlowLinkMergeRunSpeed
member.summary: 慢速连接（例如拨号网络）中的合并传送速率超出慢速链接合并运行速度阈值。

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ResynchronizeType
member.summary: 枚举指定在重新同步合并订阅时要应用的更改的值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ResynchronizeType.SinceGivenDateTime
member.summary: 使用自给定日期和时间后的所有更改重新同步订阅。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ResynchronizeType.SinceLastSnapshotApplied
member.summary: 使用自上次应用快照后的所有更改重新同步订阅。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ResynchronizeType.SinceLastSuccessfulValidation
member.summary: 使用自上次成功验证后的所有更改重新同步订阅。

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.RetentionPeriodUnits
member.summary: 枚举用于指定保持期的单位的值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.RetentionPeriodUnits.Days
member.summary: 按天指定保持期。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.RetentionPeriodUnits.Months
member.summary: 按月指定保持期。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.RetentionPeriodUnits.Weeks
member.summary: 按周指定保持期。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.RetentionPeriodUnits.Years
member.summary: 按年指定保持期。

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleConstant
member.summary: 枚举用来设置复制计划的常量值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleConstant.NoEndDate
member.summary: 没有结束日期。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleConstant.NoEndTime
member.summary: 没有结束时间。

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleFrequencySubDay
member.summary: 枚举为特定计划频率指定较小计划单位的值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleFrequencySubDay.Hour
member.summary: 计划反映使用小时作为单位安排的活动。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleFrequencySubDay.Minute
member.summary: 计划反映使用分钟作为单位安排的活动。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleFrequencySubDay.Once
member.summary: 计划反映在计划的时间单位发生一次的活动。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleFrequencySubDay.Second
member.summary: 计划反映使用秒作为单位安排的活动。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleFrequencySubDay.Unknown
member.summary: 子单位对该计划活动无效。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleFrequencySubDay.Valid
member.summary: 要测试计划有效性的掩码。

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleFrequencyType
member.summary: 枚举在计划复制代理作业时使用的频率的类型。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleFrequencyType.Continuously
member.summary: 在 Microsoft SQL Server 代理服务开始时启动复制代理作业。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleFrequencyType.Daily
member.summary: 复制代理作业每天运行。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleFrequencyType.Monthly
member.summary: 复制代理作业每月运行。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleFrequencyType.MonthlyRelative
member.summary: 复制代理作业相对于一个月的某一部分（如第二个星期）运行。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleFrequencyType.OnDemand
member.summary:
Microsoft
SQL Server 代理服务计划在明确请求复制代理作业时运行它。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleFrequencyType.OnIdle
member.summary:
Microsoft
SQL Server 代理服务在处理器处于空闲状态时的任何时间运行复制代理作业。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleFrequencyType.Unknown
member.summary: 没有计划的频率，或者频率不适用。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleFrequencyType.Weekly
member.summary: 复制代理作业每周运行。

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleRelativeIntervals
member.summary: 枚举表示相对于 的复制代理计划的频率的值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleRelativeIntervals.First
member.summary: 该事件在第一个子单位上发生。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleRelativeIntervals.Fourth
member.summary: 该事件在第四个子单位上发生。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleRelativeIntervals.Last
member.summary: 该事件在最后一个子单位上发生。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleRelativeIntervals.Second
member.summary: 该事件在第二个子单位上发生。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleRelativeIntervals.Third
member.summary: 该事件在第三个子单位上发生。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleRelativeIntervals.Unknown
member.summary: 不进行相对计划，或者相对计划不适用。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScheduleRelativeIntervals.Valid
member.summary: 所有有效的相对计划单位值的掩码。

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions
member.summary: 枚举用于生成脚本的选项，这些脚本用于创建或删除复制对象。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.Creation
member.summary: 指定生成的脚本用于创建复制对象。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.Deletion
member.summary: 指定该脚本用于删除复制对象。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.DisableReplicationDB
member.summary: 指定该脚本是一个删除脚本，它禁用数据库上的发布并删除发布所需的任何代理作业。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.EnableReplicationDB
member.summary: 指定该脚本是一个创建脚本，它启用数据库上的发布并创建发布所需的任何代理作业。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeAgentProfiles
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括对分发服务器定义的所有用户定义的复制代理配置文件。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeAll
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括可存在的所有可能的复制对象，该值等效于设置所有 值。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeArticles
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括项目。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeChangeDestinationDataTypes
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括任何用户定义的数据类型映射。在启用 选项后仅对于非 SQL Server 发布服务器支持此选项。仅在 SQL Server 2005 和更高版本中支持此选项。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeCreateDistributionAgent
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括分发代理作业。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeCreateLogreaderAgent
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括日志读取器代理作业。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeCreateMergeAgent
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括合并代理作业。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeCreateQueuereaderAgent
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括队列读取器代理作业。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeCreateSnapshotAgent
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括快照代理作业。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeDisableReplicationDB
member.summary: 指定该脚本禁用数据库上的发布并删除发布所需的任何代理作业。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeDistributionPublishers
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括发布服务器。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeEnableReplicationDB
member.summary: 指定该脚本启用数据库上的发布并创建发布所需的任何代理作业。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeGo
member.summary: 指定该脚本在批处理的末尾包括 GO 命令。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeInstallDistributor
member.summary: 指定该脚本在分发服务器上安装发布对象。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeMergeDynamicSnapshotJobs
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括具有参数化行筛选器的合并发布的任何现有分区快照作业的定义。仅在 Microsoft SQL Server 2000 和更高版本中支持此选项。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeMergeJoinFilters
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括为合并发布定义的所有联接筛选器的定义。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeMergePartitions
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括具有参数化行筛选器的合并发布的任何现有分区的定义。仅在 Microsoft SQL Server 2005 和更高版本中支持此选项。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeMergePublicationActivation
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括将合并发布的状态设置为活动状态。仅在 SQL Server 2005 和更高版本中支持此选项。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludePartialSubscriptions
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括对事务发布的订阅，这些事务发布不订阅发布中的所有项目。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludePublicationAccesses
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括添加到发布访问列表 (PAL) 的所有登录名。只有发布创建脚本才支持此选项。删除发布将自动删除该 PAL。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludePublications
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括发布。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludePublisherSideSubscriptions
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括位于发布服务器的所有订阅的注册。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludePullSubscriptions
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括所有请求订阅。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeRegisteredSubscribers
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括位于发布服务器的所有订阅服务器的注册。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeReplicationJobs
member.summary: 指定该脚本包括由复制创建的所有 SQL Server 代理作业的定义。仅在 SQL Server 2005 和更高版本中支持此选项。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.IncludeUninstallDistributor
member.summary: 指定该脚本在分发服务器上卸载发布对象。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.InstallDistributor
member.summary: 指定在分发服务器上安装发布对象的创建脚本。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.None
member.summary: 清除所有脚本选项。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ScriptOptions.UninstallDistributor

member.summary: 此订阅存在，但尚未应用初始快照。

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.SubscriptionSyncType
member.summary: 枚举为订阅执行初始同步的方式的选项。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.SubscriptionSyncType.Automatic
member.summary: 在应用初始快照时已发布表的架构和初始数据将传输到订阅服务器。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.SubscriptionSyncType.InitializeFromLSN
member.summary: 在向对等事务复制拓扑添加节点时使用。和 一起使用，以确保将所有相关事务都复制到新节点。假定订阅服务器已拥有已发布表的架构和初始数据。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.SubscriptionSyncType.InitializeWithBackup
member.summary: 从发布数据库的备份获取已发布表的架构和初始数据。此选项假定订阅服务器对发布数据库的备份具有访问权。只有事务发布才支持此选项。备份位置和备份介质类型分别由 和 指定。在使用此选项时，无需在配置期间停止对等事务复制拓扑。对非 SQL Server 发布的订阅不支持此选项。此选项仅对 SQL Server 2005 和更高版本可用。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.SubscriptionSyncType.None
member.summary: 订阅服务器已包含发布表的架构和初始数据。合并发布支持此选项。对于事务发布不再推荐此选项。请改用 。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.SubscriptionSyncType.ReplicationSupportOnly
member.summary: 如果需要，在项目的订阅服务器上自动生成支持更新订阅的自定义存储过程和触发器。只有事务发布才支持此选项。此选项假定订阅服务器已拥有已发布表的架构和初始数据。在配置对等事务复制拓扑时，确保该拓扑中所有节点上的数据都相同。在使用此选项配置对等事务复制时，停止复制拓扑。此选项仅对 SQL Server 2005 和更高版本可用。

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.TransSubscriberType
member.summary: 枚举对事务发布订阅的更新行为。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.TransSubscriberType.Failover
member.summary: 支持对订阅进行立即更新，并将排队更新作为故障转移。可以在订阅服务器上进行数据修改并立即传播到发布服务器。如果发布服务器与订阅服务器未连接在一起，则可以更改更新模式以便将在订阅服务器上所做的数据修改存储在队列中，直到订阅服务器与发布服务器重新连接在一起。不支持 Oracle 发布服务器。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.TransSubscriberType.ImmediateUpdate
member.summary: 支持立即更新订阅。不支持 Oracle 发布服务器。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.TransSubscriberType.QueuedFailover
member.summary: 支持将订阅作为排队更新订阅，并允许更改为立即更新模式。在订阅服务器和发布服务器之间建立连接之前，可以在订阅服务器上修改数据，并将数据修改存储在队列中。建立起持续连接后，即可将更新模式更改为立即更新。不支持 Oracle 发布服务器。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.TransSubscriberType.QueuedUpdate
member.summary: 支持订阅进行排队更新。可以在订阅服务器上进行数据修改，将其存储在队列中，然后传播到发布服务器。不支持 Oracle 发布服务器。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.TransSubscriberType.ReadOnly
member.summary: 该订阅是只读的。在订阅服务器上所做的更改不会发送到发布服务器。

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.TransSubscription.SubscriberProvider
member.summary: 唯一编程标识符 (PROGID)，用于注册非 SQL Server 订阅服务器的 OLE DB 访问接口。

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.TransSubscription.SubscriberProviderString
member.summary: 特定于 OLE DB 访问接口的连接字符串用于连接到非 SQL Server 订阅服务器的数据源。
member.returns: A value that can be a maximum of 4000 Unicode charactersThe property should only be set for non-SQL Server Subscribers. The value of is passed as the DBPROP_INIT_PROVIDERSTRING property to initialize the OLE DB provider.The property can only be retrieved by members of the sysadmin fixed server role, by members of the db_owner fixed database role, or by the user who created the subscription.The property can only be set by members of the sysadmin fixed server role or by members of the db_owner fixed database role.Retrieving is equivalent to executing sp_helpsubscription.Setting is equivalent to executing sp_addpushsubscription_agent or sp_changesubscription.The property is available with SQL Server 2005 only.This namespace, class, or member is supported only in version 2.0 of the .NET Framework.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ValidationMethod
member.summary: 枚举事务发布的行计数验证所支持的方法。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ValidationMethod.ConditionalFast
member.summary: 尝试快速行计数，但如果该快速方法显示任何差异，则执行完全行计数。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ValidationMethod.FastCount
member.summary: 使用 sys.sysindexes 系统表执行快速行计数验证。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ValidationMethod.FullCount
member.summary: 使用 COUNT 函数执行完整行计数。

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ValidationOption
member.summary: 枚举复制支持的数据验证类型。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ValidationOption.Checksum70
member.summary: 执行校验和计算。此选项仅在 Microsoft SQL Server 7.0 订阅服务器中受支持。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ValidationOption.Checksum80
member.summary: 执行二进制校验和计算。此选项仅在 Microsoft SQL Server 2000 及更高版本的订阅服务器中受支持。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.ValidationOption.RowCountOnly
member.summary: 执行行计数计算。

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.VerifyResolverSignatureOption
member.summary: 枚举这样的值，它们指定合并代理是否必须在基于组件对象模型 (COM) 的冲突解决程序上验证数字签名，以确定它是否来自可信任的来源。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.VerifyResolverSignatureOption.NoVerification
member.summary: 不执行数字签名验证。

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Replication.VerifyResolverSignatureOption.TrustedAuthority
member.summary: 执行数字签名验证。
